Welcome to Addis Ababa Bole International Airport (ADD) in Microsoft Flight Simulator! üåç This addon brings Ethiopia's busiest airport to life with incredible detail and realism. Whether you're navigating a commercial jet or a private aircraft, Addis Ababa Bole International Airport offers a captivating environment for all aviation enthusiasts.
